text: sakalasangatikaleyum sambandhicca sadupadesannalum ella karyannaluteyum visadansannalum nam musakk phalakannalil rekhappetuttikkeatuttu. ennittinnane parannu: "avaye murukeppitikkuka. avayile erram nalla karyannal ulkkeallan ninre janatayeat kalpikkukayum ceyyuka. adharmakarikalute tamasasthalam vaikate tanne nan ninnalkk kaniccutarunnatan.â€
